name: Hamster Fun Time
description:
A two player game where one player is a hamster, and the other is a person shaking the cage around.  The hamster has to get power ups to push a red button which will damage the cage.

Controls:

Hamster: wasd + e, Shift, Space

Shaker: arrow keys

Design, Images, and UI Design by Remy Streichenberger

Programming by Eli McArdle (Hamster, collision physics, level design)

Programming by Kyle Gunger (Shaking physics, collectables, camera)
